name: Ellen Ripley
description: Resourceful space officer who transforms from corporate employee to fierce survivor, facing alien threats with intelligence and determination. Represents the evolution from victim to warrior.

name: Travis Bickle
description: Isolated taxi driver descending into vigilante violence, representing urban alienation and the dangerous psychology of the lonely outsider seeking purpose through violence.

name: Dorothy Gale
description: Young farm girl swept into a fantastical journey, learning that home and self-worth come from within. The classic hero's journey through a child's eyes.

name: Vito Corleone
description: Powerful mafia patriarch balancing family loyalty with criminal empire, embodying the contradiction between traditional values and moral corruption.

name: Holly Golightly
description: Enigmatic social butterfly hiding vulnerability behind glamorous facade, representing the search for identity and belonging in urban anonymity.

name: Jake Gittes
description: Private investigator uncovering corruption in 1930s Los Angeles, representing the cynical hero confronting institutional power and personal moral compromise.

name: Annie Hall
description: Quirky, independent woman navigating modern romance with neurotic humor, representing authentic female complexity in relationships and self-discovery.

name: Daniel Plainview
description: Ruthless oil prospector consumed by greed and misanthropy, representing American capitalism's destructive potential and the isolation of unchecked ambition.

name: Marge Gunderson
description: Pregnant small-town police chief solving brutal crimes with folksy wisdom and moral clarity, representing competent authority and Midwestern values.

name: Tyler Durden
description: Charismatic anarchist leader challenging consumer culture through underground fight clubs, representing rebellion against modern masculinity and corporate conformity.

name: Clarice Starling
description: Ambitious FBI trainee confronting serial killers while overcoming class and gender barriers, representing intelligence and determination in male-dominated institutions.

name: The Dude
description: Laid-back bowler reluctantly drawn into criminal conspiracy, representing passive resistance to life's complications and the absurdity of modern existence.

name: Scarlett O'Hara
description: Determined Southern belle surviving Civil War through ruthless pragmatism, representing resilience, vanity, and the transformation of American society.

name: Atticus Finch
description: Principled lawyer defending justice in racist small town, representing moral courage and the complexity of progressive ideals in conservative environments.

name: Norma Desmond
description: Aging silent film star living in delusion, representing Hollywood's cruelty and the tragic cost of fame and the passage of time.

name: Alex DeLarge
description: Charismatic sociopathic youth leader of violent gang, representing questions of free will, rehabilitation, and the nature of evil in modern society.

name: Sarah Connor
description: Waitress transformed into warrior mother protecting humanity's future, representing the evolution from ordinary person to legendary figure through necessity.

name: Antoine Doinel
description: Mischievous French boy navigating adolescence with humor and rebellion, representing universal coming-of-age struggles and the search for identity.

name: Blanche DuBois
description: Fragile Southern belle clinging to illusions while facing harsh reality, representing the collision between fantasy and truth, gentility and brutality.

name: The Man with No Name
description: Mysterious gunfighter operating by his own moral code in lawless frontier, representing the archetypal antihero and American individualism.

name: Lester Burnham
description: Middle-aged suburban father experiencing midlife crisis and rebellion against conformity, representing American middle-class dissatisfaction and mortality.

name: Am√©lie Poulain
description: Whimsical young woman secretly helping others find happiness while discovering her own capacity for love, representing kindness and magical realism in everyday life.

name: Michael Corleone
description: War hero reluctantly inheriting family crime business, representing the corruption of innocence and the price of power and loyalty.

name: Thelma Dickinson
description: Repressed housewife discovering freedom through criminal road trip, representing female liberation and rebellion against patriarchal constraints.

name: Louise Sawyer
description: Waitress and protective friend whose past trauma drives desperate flight from justice, representing solidarity between women and consequences of violence.

name: Hannibal Lecter
description: Brilliant psychiatrist and cannibalistic serial killer who helps capture other criminals, representing the seductive nature of evil and intellectual superiority.

name: Neo Anderson
description: Computer programmer discovering reality is simulation and becoming humanity's savior, representing awakening to truth and the hero's journey in digital age.

name: Maximus Decimus Meridius
description: Roman general enslaved as gladiator seeking revenge against corrupt emperor, representing honor, vengeance, and the fall of empires.

name: Erin Brockovich
description: Single mother with no legal training who takes on corporate polluters, representing working-class heroism and environmental justice.

name: Jules Winnfield
description: Philosophical hitman questioning his violent lifestyle through biblical interpretation, representing redemption and moral awakening in criminal underworld.
